name: Communist Cool Guy Teaches Sharing - DLC
name_original: Communist Cool Guy Teaches Sharing - DLC
description:
In a world, where the USSR had triumphed in world dominance. Where every nation was a communism. Where children at school, around the globe, would start every morning by saying, "Sharing. Is. Caring". Well that world just might exist, enter Communist Cool Guy Teaches Sharing.

This game does not represent my actual views. This game was created solely for comedic purposes ONLY.
